prompt: Monitor r/startups for negative sentiment about 'Acme Corp'. If there are more than 5 negative posts in the last 24 hours, draft a crisis response document 'Crisis_Response.md' in the 'General' folder. Report the document ID (or say 'No crisis' if fewer posts).
gold_response: Found 6 negative posts about Acme Corp in r/startups. Created Crisis_Response.md (ID: doc009).

rubric.criteria: The agent must search r/startups for posts mentioning 'Acme Corp'.
The agent must identify at least 6 negative posts from the last 24 hours.
The agent must create 'Crisis_Response.md' in the 'General' folder because the threshold (>5) was met.
The agent must report the document ID of the created response.
